actually.translation[0].definitions[0].d: used to add new information to what you have just said, to give your opinion, or to start a new conversation
actually.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I’ve known Barbara for years. Since we were babies, actually.
Actually, on second thoughts, I don’t think I want to go out tonight.
actually.translation[0].definitions[1].d: used to emphasize the real or exact truth of a situation, rather than what people may think
actually.translation[0].definitions[1].e: What time are you actually leaving?
